text: The 1881 Penn State football team was an American football that represented Pennsylvania State College—now known as Pennsylvania State University–during the 1881 college football season. It was the first football team fielded by the school. Penn State played only one game in 1881, beating Lewisburg by a score of 9–0. Although this game was reported in two State College newspapers and The Mirror, the University of Lewisburg campus newspaper, Bucknell denies that this game ever happened. Penn State did not field teams from 1882 through 1886. ==Schedule== ==References== Penn State Category:Penn State Nittany Lions football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Penn State football
title: 1881 Penn State football team
